description.displayText:
It's with heavy heart that we are leaving NJ and having to part with Secilia.

Secilia has been a part of our family over the last year, and we will truly miss her fun- loving sense of humor.

She took care of our 2 month old daughter and our 18 months old son. Secilia easily handled both children and was able to get them both on a schedule and potty train our son at 2 years old.

In the time we worked together, Secilia never missed a day and was always available to work early mornings or late nights to accommodate out schedules.

Secilia if you're reading this come to San Diego.... we miss you already.
description.originalText:

Secilia has been a part of our family over the last year, and we will truly miss her fun- loving sense of humor.

She took care of our 2 month old daughter and our 18 months old son. Secilia easily handled both children and was able to get them both on a schedule and potty train our son at 2 years old.

In the time we worked together, Secilia never missed a day and was always available to work early mornings or late nights to accommodate out schedules.

Secilia if you're reading this come to San Diego.... we miss you already.

description.displayText: Secilia has been a caretaker for our family for over two years.  Our daughter has thrived, and this is in large part due to Secilia's care and attention.  She has been very active with our daughter, making every day a fun and educational experience.  Secilia is affectionate and compassionate, our little one simply adores her.  We will sincerely miss having her as our daughter's nanny (she will be attending preschool) but we hope to have her in our lives for many years to come, as she is most certainly a part of our family.
